}else{page=page}

}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "üîí":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\dÂç∑ÈÉ®Á´†ËäÇÂõû.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, " "),
      url: url,
      info: `Êõ¥Êñ∞Êó∂Èó¥: ${chapter.uT} Â≠óÊï∞: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

let domain = "."; function addOptions(url, options) { let headers = { Referer: baseUrl.replace(/,[\s\S]+\}/,"") }; if (!url.includes(domain)) { headers.Referer = ""; } options = options || {}; options.headers = Object.assign(options.headers || {}, headers); return options ? `${url},${JSON.stringify(options)}` : url; } function toImg(url, func, options) { let generateImgTag = (u) => ``; let generateHtml = (u, i, t) => typeof func == "function" ? generateImgTag(func(u, i, t)) : generateImgTag(u); return Array.isArray(url) ? url.map(generateHtml).join("\n") : generateHtml(url.toString()); } function load(urls) { for (i = 0; i < urls.length; i++) { let response = java.ajax(urls[i] + 'User_Activation.json'); if (JSON.stringify(response).includes("qyyuapi")){ return [response, urls[i]]; } } throw "Error: ÊâÄÊúâÈìæÊé•‰∏ãËΩΩÂ§±Ë¥•"; } function parseKey(jsUrl) { let jsBaseUrls = [ "https://raw.githubusercontents.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator@main/" ]; let urls = [ "plugins/common.js", "plugins/manwa.js", "plugins/evalPacker.js", "tools/babel_asttool.js", "tools/config.js", "tools/decode.js", "tools/decodeOb.js", "tools/usefulPlugins.js", ]; let jsBaseUrl = cache.get("decodeObfuscator"); if (!jsBaseUrl) { jsBaseUrl = load(jsBaseUrls)[1]; cache.put("decodeObfuscator", jsBaseUrl); } String.prototype.toAbsUrl = function() { return /^\.\/|^http|^content|^\/sdcard|^\/storage/.test(this) ? this : jsBaseUrl.concat(this); }; function loadJS(urls) { return jsBaseUrl && urls.map(url => script(java.importScript(url.toAbsUrl()))).join("\n") || ""; } function script(content) { return ``; } let html = `${loadJS(urls)}`; let key = JSON.parse(java.webView(html, Get('url'), "keys"))[0]; return key; } if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { let DEBUG = 0; let origin = Get('url'); let chjs = src.match(/['"](.*?ch.js\?v=(\d+))/); if (DEBUG || (chjs && chjs[2] != 202208132)) { cache.put("manwa_aes_key", parseKey(chjs[1])); } let imgs = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src) .select(".content-img") .toArray() .map(v => { let dataRsrc = v.attr("data-r-src"); return dataRsrc ? dataRsrc : ""; }) .filter(v => v !== ""); if (DEBUG) { imgs.splice(1); } var result = toImg(imgs, null, { headers: { origin: origin } }); result; } else { '
'; }

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(!cache.get("ua2")){   
	h=JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/microlinkhq/top-user-agents/master/src/desktop.json"))
java.log(h.length)
x =Math.floor(Math.random() *h.length)
java.log(h[x])	
cache.put("ua2", h[x],86400);
    	}
//!(/google.cn/).test(baseUrl)?h=java.getString("id.acontent@html"):h=decodeURIComponent(baseUrl.replace(/^.*?text=/, ''));
url = baseUrl.replace("www.bilinovel.com","tw.linovelib.com")
//re = java.ajax(baseUrl)
//re = java.ajax(url)
//h = java.webView(null,url,null);
//java.setContent(re); 
h = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
//java.log(h)
java.setContent(h)

h=java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children").not("[data-ad-client]").not("script")//Clear ads
//END
if(0){//jump old codes

original_list = java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children")

java.setContent(h)
h = java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children");
//java.log(h[4])
//java.log(h.length)
if(h.length!=original_list.length){//there is repeat item
	

//replace to correct text
function confident(str1, str2){
	if(str1.length!=str2.length){
		return false; 
		}
		if(str1.length==0){
			return true;
			}
		confidence =0;
		target = Math.max(1,Math.floor(str1.length/2));
	for(let i=0;i<str1.length;i++){
		if(str1[i]==str2[i]){
			confidence++;
			if(confidence>=target){
				return true;
				}
			}
		}
		return false;
	}
k=0
for(let i=0;i<original_list.length;i++){
if(k>=h.length){
break;
}
ele = original_list[i]
str = String(java.getString("text",ele));
strcom = String(java.getString("text",h[k]));
java.log(str)
java.log(strcom)
//java.log(str.length)
//java.log(strcom.length)
while(k<h.length&&!confident(str,strcom)){
k++
strcom = String(java.getString("text",h[k]));
java.log("x")
java.log(strcom)
//java.log(strcom.length)
}

if(k<h.length){
if(java.getString("tag.script@all",ele)!= ""){
original_list[i] = h[0]
}else{
original_list[i] = h[k]
}
}

k++
}
h = original_list
}//close repeat item
else
{
	h = java.getString("tag.body@tag.div.5@html")
	}
//run readtools.js match words
//run js file's last line
//jsLink = java.getString("tag.script@src").match(new RegExp("https.+readtools.+", "gi"))[0];
//h=String(h);
//code = String(java.ajax(jsLink)).trim().split("\n").pop().trim().split(";")[1];
}//end of old code
h
</js>
